game.shortDescription: 꽃 하면 벚꽃, 여고생 하면 사무라이! 전국 시대 난세의 악을 베는 미소녀 검극 액션!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A young woman from the 21st century with sharp swordsmanship skills finds herself in Honnō-ji during the Sengoku period! Together with a trio of newfound ninja friends, she races through the Underworld beneath Honnō-ji, confronted by enraged corpses at every turn!
